job.title: Software Engineer (Entry level)
job.description: Client is a team of software architecture specialists, bilingual in business and technology, who set the standard for architecture excellence in the insurance and healthcare industries. Careers with the client offer rapid growth, constant learning, and the immediate chance to make an impact. From day one here, you'll be working side-by-side with our senior architects, contributing to high-impact projects and meeting with our clients face- to-face.
